summary:
John Wick is an American action thriller media franchise consisting of three films created and written by Derek Kolstad, directed by Chad Stahelski, and distributed by Summit Entertainment. Keanu Reeves stars as the eponymous character, John Wick, a retired but deadly hitman seeking vengeance.
The series commenced with the release of John Wick in 2014. It was then followed by two sequels, John Wick: Chapter 2 released on February 10, 2017, and John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum released on May 17, 2019. All three films were considered critical and commercial successes; with the series accruing a collective gross of more than $581 million worldwide. A fourth installment, John Wick: Chapter 4 is in the works, and is set for release on May 21, 2021.
